primevc.core.collections.SimpleList

type
class
implements
IEditableList<DataType>
.IEditableList implementation as FastList. When this list is iterated it will start with the first added item instead of the last added item as with FastList.

Constructor

new()

Instance Variables

beforeChange(default,null) : primevc.core.events.ListChangeSignal<DataType>

change(default,null) : primevc.core.events.ListChangeSignal<DataType>

first(default,null) : FastDoubleCell<DataType>

Pointer to the first added cell

last(default,null) : FastDoubleCell<DataType>

Pointer to the last added cell

length(getLength,null) : Int

Instance Methods

add(item : DataType, ?pos : Int) : DataType

clone() : IReadOnlyList<DataType>

dispose() : Void

duplicate() : IReadOnlyList<DataType>

forwardIterator() : primevc.core.collections.iterators.IIterator<DataType>

getItemAt(pos : Int) : DataType

parameters
pos
returns
Returns the item at the given position. It is allowed to give negative values. The returned item will then be on position -> length - askedPosition

has(item : DataType) : Bool

indexOf(item : DataType) : Int

inline insertAt(item : DataType, ?pos : Int) : Int

parameters
item
pos
returns
position where the cell is inserted
Method does the same thing as the add method, except that it won't fire an 'added' event.
